name: Matches Three - Candy & Sugar Bubbles Blast Games
name_original: Matches Three - Candy & Sugar Bubbles Blast Games
description:
Match Three Candy is a match three game that is easy to learn but difficult to master. It is a nonstop blitz of cute Candy themes!

The game is simple. Help the keeper line up three or more identical items vertically or horizontally. Earn tons of tokens along the way and use them to buy fun Powerups.

Game Features:
**CHOOSE A BACKGROUND**
Pick your style in 5 unique themes ( Must be purchase for unlock all )

**DIG THE ULTRA-COOL DESIGN**
Check out the sweet graphics and groove to original songs and sound effects as you bust a move, DX style.

**TRY 3 MODES OF GAMEPLAY**
Levels – Test your skills and become the best.
Timed – Match as many items as you can as the clock winds down.
Endless – Swipe, dash, and crush to your heart's content and earn tons of tokens.
